Class ConsoleFormatter

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.hotel.commandcontrol.commandutils.ConsoleFormatter
public class ConsoleFormatter extends Object
A utility class for printing formatted output to the console, such as tables, headers, and properties.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    printHeader(String title)
    Prints a formatted header (e.g., for the 'view' command).
    static void
    printProperty(String key, Object value)
    Prints a key-value pair in a clean, aligned format.
    static void
    printRow(String format, Object... args)
    Prints a single, formatted table row.
    static void
    printSeparator(int width)
    Prints a separator line for a table.

  • Method Details

    • printRow

      public static void printRow(String format, Object... args)
      Prints a single, formatted table row.
      Parameters:
      format - The printf format string (e.g., "| %-10s | %-15s |")
      args - The arguments to insert into the format string.

    • printSeparator

      public static void printSeparator(int width)
      Prints a separator line for a table.
      Parameters:
      width - The total width of the table.

    • printHeader

      public static void printHeader(String title)
      Prints a formatted header (e.g., for the 'view' command).
      Parameters:
      title - The title to display in the header.

    • printProperty

      public static void printProperty(String key, Object value)
      Prints a key-value pair in a clean, aligned format.
      Parameters:
      key - The property key.
      value - The property value.
